meanings.sent1: The email looked spammy with all those flashy ads.
meanings.sent2: The website had a spammy feel with pop-ups everywhere.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't trust the spammy website with all its strange links.
meanings.sent4: The spammy design of the flyer made it hard to take seriously.
meanings.sent5: The spammy smell of the canned meat lingered in the room.

meanings.sent1: Receiving spammy emails can be annoying.
meanings.sent2: The company sent out spammy messages to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The mailbox was full of spammy flyers for weight loss products.
meanings.sent4: The spammy texts flooded her phone every day.
meanings.sent5: The spammy calls interrupted his peaceful evening.

meanings.definition: Excessive or unwanted content on the internet
meanings.sent1: The website was full of spammy links to clickbait articles.
meanings.sent2: Avoid clicking on spammy websites to protect your computer.
meanings.sent3: The spammy pop-ups made it hard to read the actual content.
meanings.sent4: Her social media feed was cluttered with spammy posts.
meanings.sent5: The spammy ads kept popping up no matter where she clicked.
